name: myShavingClub.com
overview:
my Shaving Club is a Chicago, IL-based company that delivers personal grooming products, such as razors, by mail. The company operates on a subscription-based model for home delivery rather selling through conventional retail channels.

myShavingClub offers four kinds of membership plans, and members can upgrade or downgrade their plan whenever they like. The Men’s razor plans include: Dapper I $5.99/month for two cartridges of 5 blades (includes shipping), Dapper II $8.49/month for three cartridges of 5 blades (includes shipping). The Women’s razor plans include: Belle I $5.99/month for two cartridges of 5 blades (includes shipping), and Belle II $8.49/month for three cartridges of 5 blades (includes shipping).Each plan comes with a free compatible handle and Travel case.The Women’s plan comes with a free handle, suction cup and a shower hanger. The company says it plans to expand its offerings to include additional American made grooming products. myShavingClub’s blades are made in USA.
